thread.section_title: Mosaic Weighted Blankets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mosaic Weighted Blankets | mosaicweightedblankets.com
thread.title: kathy lynn
thread.title_full: Mosaic Weighted Blankets reviewed by kathy lynn

author: kathy lynn
title: kathy lynn
text:
Daughter got to help sleep - has severe anxiety.Didn't really help.
Felt like I spent a lot of money for nothing.
Its expensive to return, so we are going to empty the pellets and insert filling to use as a regular blanket. I wouldn't suggest even trying this product unless the price came way down. Its just not worth even trying really.
